snippet: F.B.I. counterintelligence agents have searched the home and office of Robin L. Raphel, a veteran American diplomat, but have not said whether she was a target of their investigation.
abstract: Federal Bureau of Investigation counterintelligence agents are investigating veteran American diplomat Robin L Raphel on suspicion that she took classified information home from the State Dept; Raphel is a retired ambassador and expert on Pakistan, who until recently was an adviser to State Dept.

byline.original: By MARK MAZZETTI and MATT APUZZO
byline.contributor: Salman Masood contributed reporting from Islamabad, and Michael S. Schmidt from Washington.

lead_paragraph: F.B.I. counterintelligence agents have searched the home and office of Robin L. Raphel, a veteran American diplomat, but have not said whether she was a target of their investigation.

headline.main: F.B.I. Is Investigating Retired U.S. Diplomat, a Pakistan Expert, Officials Say
headline.print_headline: F.B.I. Is Investigating Retired U.S. Diplomat, a Pakistan Expert, Officials Say
